name: sfchronicle
text:
Skiing in Tahoe this season is going to be different.

- Face coverings will be required in all common areas. 
- Physical distancing in lift lines, chairlifts, and lodges will be enforced. 
- Buying lift ticket will need to be done online ahead of time.

https://t.co/9Zk4YWmOzM

name: sfchronicle
text:

Black people, who make up less than 6% of the city’s population, accounted for nearly half the victims. https://t.co/LdYTNOz12a

text:
